fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to attack at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first time you use your ability, killed players have their cause of death hidden.
- Beginning at Tier 1 every consecutive day your name isn't said, your nickname isn't said, or you haven't been pinged by another player, your ability Tier increases.
- If your name is mentioned, you will go back to Tier 1.
- Once you reach Tier 3, you must send at least 2 messages during the day to increase in Tiers. If you fail to do this, you will go back to Tier 1.
- You cannot go past Tier 6

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- T1: Basic Attack.
- T2: Basic + Roleblocking Attack.
- T3: Powerful Attack.
- T4: Powerful Attack. Select two players to attack.
- T5: Unstoppable Attack. Select two players to attack.
- T6: Unstoppable Rampage. Select two players to attack.
